name: StyleCraft Professional Complete Bundle - Clipper, Trimmer & Shaver
shortDescription: Complete professional styling bundle with clipper, trimmer, and your choice of black or pink shaver
description: Get the ultimate StyleCraft professional bundle! This complete set includes the Metal Edition Instinct Clipper, Metal Edition Trimmer, and your choice of Metal Edition Shaver in Black or Pink. Save over $319 on this premium combo perfect for professional barbers and stylists.
features: Full metal construction on all tools
Choice of Black or Pink shaver
Extended battery life on all tools
